in-game.dchannel_id: id of the channel where /d messages will be posted
in-game.channel_id: id of the channel where /gr messages will be posted
in-game.live_chat_channel_id: id of the channel where all (in-game) messages will be posted

discord.closeServer_role_id: id of the role which has the permission to close the server
discord.gameOver_role_id: id of the role which has the 'gameOver' permission
discord.changeMap_role_id: id of the role which has the 'changeMap' permission
discord.serverdown_channel_id: id of the channel where the bot needs to post the info/ping message
discord.serverdown_role_id: id of the role which needs to know/be pinged if the server is down
discord.serverdown_name: name/url of server (if this is blank the bot won't specify which server is down
